description: Unique donor identifier (synthetic).
Donor age at as_of_date (years).
Self-reported sex (synthetic).
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
Geographic region grouping.
ABO/Rh blood type.
Flag for rare blood type within the donor’s country (based on prevalence).
Smoking status flag (synthetic).
Body Mass Index.
Indicator for chronic condition (synthetic). 1 if deferral_reason == chronic_condition, else 0.
Eligibility flag at as_of_date; redundant with eligibility_status.
Reason for deferral when not eligible; NaN when eligibility_status==eligible.
Preferred donation site type.
Number of donations in the last 12 months before as_of_date.
Flag indicating a regular donation pattern (synthetic).
Years since first recorded donation year.
Total lifetime donations (synthetic).
Year of first recorded donation.
Date of the most recent donation prior to as_of_date.
Days since last donation: as_of_date - last_donation_date.
Age at first donation: age - years_since_first_donation.
Prevalence of the donor’s blood type in their country (from blood_population_distribution).
Synthetic propensity score feature (not a real-world model output).
Eligibility class at as_of_date: eligible, temporary_deferral, permanent_deferral.
Reference snapshot date for the record.
Binary label derived from next_6m_donation_count (>0).
Number of donation events in the next 6 months (synthetic). Capped at 3 for cadence realism.
Donor blood type for RBC transfusion compatibility lookup.
Recipient blood type for RBC transfusion compatibility lookup.
Compatibility flag for RBC transfusion (donor → recipient).
Compatibility level label.
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
Region grouping used in the main table.
Synthetic country population size used for weighting/realism.
Prevalence of blood type O POS in the country.
Prevalence of blood type O NEG in the country.
Prevalence of blood type A POS in the country.
Prevalence of blood type A NEG in the country.
Prevalence of blood type B POS in the country.
Prevalence of blood type B NEG in the country.
Prevalence of blood type AB POS in the country.
Prevalence of blood type AB NEG in the country.
Country-level Rh- rate (sum of negative blood types).
